title: Delete Operations
subject: MongoDB
theory: Delete operations remove documents from a collection. You specify a filter to determine which documents to remove.

common_mistakes.correction: Passing an empty filter removes ALL documents. Be extremely careful.

interview_questions.question: Is deleting documents faster than dropping a collection?
interview_questions.answer: No. db.collection.drop() is much faster to remove all data than deleting documents one by one.

summary: Removing old or unwanted data is essential for database hygiene.
